rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral language without high-potency verbs, metaphors, or other Q2 cues.
'killed off' is a containment verb, excluded by Rule 5 unless vivid language is used. Contains Q5 cue.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports actions taken and a bare negation ('so far no human cases... have been detected') handled under Q7.
Segment contains Q5 cues ('no human cases...have been detected') but not Q6.
The segment contains the bare negation 'so far no human cases of the virus have been detected' without explicit calming cues.
